verses.verse: Paul <S%G3972><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Silvanus <S%G4610><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Timothy, <S%G5095><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Assembly <S%G1577><s%> Of Thessalonians <S%G2331><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> From <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3962><s%>, Our Father <S%G2257><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

We Give Thanks <S%G2168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To God <S%G2316><s%> Always <S%G3842><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> You, <S%G5216><s%> Mention <S%G3417><s%>, Of You <S%G5216><s%> Making <S%G4160><s%> At <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4335><s%> Our Prayers, <S%G2257><s%>

Unceasingly <S%G89><s%> Remembering <S%G3421><s%> Your <S%G5216><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Work <S%G2041><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Faith <S%G4102><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Labour <S%G2873><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Love <S%G26><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Endurance <S%G5281><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Hope <S%G1680><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Lord <S%G2962><s%> Our <S%G2257><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ, <S%G5547><s%> Before <S%G1715><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our; <S%G2257><s%>
Knowing, <S%G1492><s%> Brethren <S%G80><s%> Beloved <S%G25><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1589><s%> Your Election. <S%G5216><s%>

Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2098><s%> Our Glad Tidings <S%G2257><s%> <S%G3756><s%> Came Not <S%G1096><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Only, <S%G3440><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Power <S%G1411><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Full Assurance <S%G4136><s%> Much, <S%G4183><s%> Even As <S%G2531><s%> Ye Know <S%G1492><s%> What <S%G3634><s%> We Were <S%G1096><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> ' For The Sake Of <S%G1223><s%> You : <S%G5209><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Ye <S%G5210><s%> Imitators <S%G3402><s%> Of Us <S%G2257><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Having Accepted <S%G1209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Tribulation <S%G2347><s%> Much <S%G4183><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Of The Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy, <S%G40><s%>

So That <S%G5620><s%> Became <S%G1096><s%> Ye <S%G5209><s%> Patterns <S%G5179><s%> To All <S%G3956><s%> Those <S%G3588><s%> Believing <S%G4100><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Achaia : <S%G882><s%>

' <S%G575><s%> <S%G5216><s%> For From You <S%G1063><s%> Has Sounded Out <S%G1837><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Only <S%G3440><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Achaia, <S%G882><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Place <S%G5117><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4102><s%> Your Faith <S%G5216><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> Towards <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Has Gone Abroad, <S%G1831><s%> So As <S%G5620><s%> No <S%G3361><s%> Need <S%G5532><s%> <S%G2248><s%> For Us To Have <S%G2192><s%> To Say <S%G2980><s%> Anything; <S%G5100><s%>

<S%G846><s%> For Themselves <S%G1063><s%> Concerning <S%G4012><s%> Us <S%G2257><s%> Relate <S%G518><s%> What <S%G3697><s%> Entrance In <S%G1529><s%> We Have <S%G2192><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Ye Turned <S%G1994><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Idols, <S%G1497><s%> To Serve <S%G1398><s%> A God <S%G2316><s%> Living <S%G2198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> True, <S%G228><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> To Await <S%G362><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> His <S%G846><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Whom <S%G3739><s%> He Raised <S%G1453><s%> From Among The <S%G1537><s%> Dead <S%G3498><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Delivers <S%G4506><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wrath <S%G3709><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Coming. <S%G2064><s%>
